metadata.name: PUA - Advanced IP/Port Scanner Update Check
metadata.comment: Detect the update check performed by Advanced IP/Port Scanner utilities.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(http_request.url), lower('/checkupdate.php')) AND contains(lower(http_request.args), lower('lng=')) AND contains(lower(http_request.args), lower('ver=')) AND contains(lower(http_request.args), lower('beta=')) AND contains(lower(http_request.args), lower('type=')) AND contains(lower(http_request.args), lower('rmode=')) AND contains(lower(http_request.args), lower('product=')))

output.summary: Detect the update check performed by Advanced IP/Port Scanner utilities.

metadata.objective: False positive: Expected if you legitimately use the Advanced IP or Port Scanner utilities in your environement. References: https://www.advanced-ip-scanner.com/, https://www.advanced-port-scanner.com/
